thread.title: Trending: Real Madrid beaten again, Man United top rich list ahead of Barca
thread.title_full: Trending: Real Madrid beaten again, Man United top rich list ahead of Barca

author: ESPN staff
title: Trending: Real Madrid beaten again, Man United top rich list ahead of Barca
text:
- Steven Gerrard has urged Daniel Sturridge to prove he can be a Liverpool hero in a team "on the verge of something really big." 
- Klopp says he expects FA Cup match-winner Lucas Leiva to stay at Liverpool beyond the January transfer window. 
UNITED STATES : Jermaine Jones says Tim Howard's comments that some foreign-raised Americans don't have the same commitment to the national team as others are a slippery slope . 
MLS : Brazilian star Kaka, entering the final season of his three-year deal with Orlando City, wants to stay in MLS beyond the 2017 season. 
MEXICO : Chivas coach Matias Almeyda believes Mexico can win a World Cup , but that Liga MX clubs need to believe more in the Mexican player. 
AFRICAN NATIONS CUP : Cameroon came from behind to win 2-1 against Guinea-Bissau, while Gabon were frustrated again in a 1-1 draw with Burkina Faso. REVIEW 
Follow @ESPNFC on Twitter to keep up with the latest football updates.
